item.title: Anushka Shetty's Ghaati to release worldwide on this date - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Anushka Shetty's Ghaati to release worldwide on this date

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

The much-awaited film 'Ghaati', starring Anushka Shetty, is set to be released worldwide on April 18, 2025. The announcement was made by the makers along with an intense poster.

  • 'Ghaati' will be released in Telugu, Tamil, Hindi, Kannada, and Malayalam.
  • Directed by Krish Jagarlamudi, the film presents Anushka in a new avatar.
  • The initial poster revealed Anushka smoking a pipe with a powerful tagline: "Victim, criminal, legend."
  • This will be Anushka's second collaboration with director Krish after 'Vedam'.
  • Anushka is also making her Malayalam debut in the film 'Kathanar - The Wild Sorcerer'.
"The Queen, at her best, will reign at the box office. #Ghaati GRAND RELEASE WORLDWIDE ON 18th APRIL, 2025."

Overall, 'Ghaati' is highly anticipated and promises to showcase Anushka Shetty's versatile talent in the lead role.

item.title: Triptii Dimri Avoids Paps As She Gets Spotted With Rumoured BF Sam Merchant, Says ‚ÄòJao Please‚Äô | Watch - News18
item.description:
Triptii Dimri Avoids Paps As She Gets Spotted With Rumoured BF Sam Merchant, Says ‚ÄòJao Please‚Äô | Watch

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: News18

Triptii Dimri was recently spotted with her rumoured boyfriend Sam Merchant, where she made her desire for privacy clear by asking the paparazzi to leave them alone.

  • Triptii Dimri and Sam Merchant were papped while trying to maintain their privacy.
  • During the encounter, Triptii was dressed in a black t-shirt and denim, and she asked the photographers to 'Jao jao please'.
  • Both have been linked romantically, although neither has confirmed the relationship.
  • Triptii previously attended a concert by Bryan Adams with Sam Merchant.
  • She is currently filming for the romantic drama 'Dhadak 2'.
"Jao jao please." - Triptii Dimri, asking paparazzi to leave them alone.

This incident highlights both Triptii's growing fame and her attempts to manage her public image amidst speculation about her personal life.

item.title: Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024 - The Times of India
item.description:
```html

Weekly Horoscope: December 16th to 22nd, 2024

Publication Date: December 16, 2024 | Source: Times of India

Explore the weekly horoscope predictions for each zodiac sign, with insights on relationships, careers, finances, and health, as guided by astrologer Vishal Bhardwaj.

  • Aries: Face challenges with confidence, and expect clarity in relationships.
  • Taurus: Focus on stability and resolve long-standing issues at work.
  • Gemini: Embrace new ideas; prioritize tasks to avoid overwhelm.
  • Cancer: Nurture relationships while managing emotional well-being.
  • Leo: Balance work ambition with personal connections.
  • Virgo: Celebrate small wins while solving challenges practically.
  • Libra: Seek balance amidst career demands and personal life.
  • Scorpio: Blend caution with boldness, focusing on emotional stability.
  • Sagittarius: Focus on self-discipline while allowing creativity to flourish.
  • Capricorn: Balance ambition with self-care for health benefits.
  • Aquarius: Nurture relationships while leading with innovative ideas.
  • Pisces: Embrace intuition; health concerns require mindfulness.
‚ÄúYour energy and drive will be your greatest assets this week.‚Äù - Vishal Bhardwaj

This week presents various opportunities for growth and challenges for each zodiac sign. It's a time to navigate changes with awareness and responsiveness.

item.title: Allu Arjun visits uncle Chiranjeevi with wife Sneha Reddy and kids after being released from jail. Watch - The Indian Express
item.description:
Allu Arjun visits uncle Chiranjeevi with wife Sneha Reddy and kids after being released from jail. Watch.

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: Indian Express

Following his release from jail, actor Allu Arjun visited his uncle Chiranjeevi at his residence, accompanied by his wife Sneha Reddy and children Ayaan and Arha. The visit was highlighted on social media with several videos capturing the family's arrival.

  • Allu Arjun was released from jail after a tragic incident involving a stampede during a screening of Pushpa 2.
  • He was seen driving to Chiranjeevi's residence in an orange hoodie, with his family in the car.
  • Videos of the family's arrival at Chiranjeevi‚Äôs home circulated widely on social media.
  • The stampede resulted in the death of a 39-year-old woman, leading to legal action against Arjun and his security team.
  • Many celebrities came to show support after his release, including Rana Daggubati and Vijay Deverakonda.

BREAKING: Allu Arjun family arrives at Chiranjeevi residenceüè°üè† pic.twitter.com/GC8FLgBe9H

‚Äî Manobala Vijayabalan (@ManobalaV) December 15, 2024

The family's visit marks a moment of reconciliation following a difficult period, reflecting the support Arjun has received from the film community during this challenging time.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 10: Allu Arjun Starrer Beats Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs No.1 Film By Earning 86.34 Crores On 2nd Saturday! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office Day 10: Allu Arjun Starrer Beats Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs No.1 Film By Earning 86

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun‚Äôs "Pushpa 2" has gained significant traction during its second weekend, quickly surpassing 1200 crore at the worldwide box office and overtaking Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs "Jawan".

  • The film grossed an impressive 86.34 crore on day 10.
  • Day 10 saw 74.34 crore in India, marking a 68% increase from the previous day.
  • Overseas collections rose from 7 crore to 12 crore.
  • The total Indian gross is now at 987.36 crores, with an overseas total of 238 crores.
  • Overall, "Pushpa 2" has reached 1225.36 crore globally, making it the fifth highest-grossing Indian film of all time.
"With 1225.36 crore gross in the kitty, Pushpa 2 has surpassed the lifetime collection of Shah Rukh Khan‚Äôs Jawan (1163.82 crore gross)."

The film is expected to continue its impressive run, potentially earning around 80 crore today, further solidifying its record-breaking achievements.

item.title: Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection: Allu Arjun film sees 70% jump after arrest saga, beats SRK's Jawan - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Pushpa 2 The Rule worldwide box office collection: Allu Arjun film sees 70% jump after arrest saga, beats SRK's Jawan

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Pushpa 2: The Rule has achieved remarkable box office success, crossing ‚Çπ1196 crore worldwide in just 10 days, fueled by a significant jump following the arrest of its lead actor, Allu Arjun.

  • The film saw a 70% increase in worldwide earnings after Arjun's arrest, with a 74% jump in the domestic market.
  • It earned ‚Çπ86 crore on its tenth day, surpassing Shah Rukh Khan's Jawan.
  • Overall, Pushpa 2 is nearing the ‚Çπ1200 crore mark and is now set to challenge KGF Chapter 2's record of ‚Çπ1208 crore.
  • The film has bolstered its overseas earnings, approaching $2 million on its tenth day.
  • Pushpa 2: The Rule is directed by Sukumar and features Allu Arjun alongside Rashmika Mandanna and Fahadh Faasil.
"Pushpa 2 should be able to cross KGF 2 on Sunday and then make a beeline for another blockbuster, SS Rajamouli's RRR (‚Çπ1309 crore)."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's impressive performance at the box office demonstrates the film's popularity and the resilience of its leading star, Allu Arjun, amid controversy. The film is poised to continue its success trajectory in the coming days.

item.title: Lavanya Tripathi to Star in Satya's Sathi Leelavathi.. - Greatandhra

Source: The Indian Express

Filmmaker Anurag Kashyap‚Äôs daughter Aaliyah Kashyap tied the knot with her long-time beau Shane Gregoire on December 11. Anurag shared his thoughts on the wedding via Instagram.

  • Aaliyah Kashyap married Shane Gregoire on December 11.
  • Anurag Kashyap expressed his emotions with the caption, ‚ÄúYe bhi gayi .. @shanegregoire my Silly take care of her.‚Äù

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 10: Allu Arjun Creates History Surpassing Stree 2‚Äôs 2nd Saturday ‚Äì 3 Unbelievable Records Destroyed! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 10: Allu Arjun Creates History Surpassing Stree 2‚Äôs 2nd Saturday ‚Äì 3

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Koimoi

Allu Arjun has set a new record at the box office with Pushpa 2, becoming the second South Indian film to cross the 500 crore mark, following Baahubali 2.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed a total of 507.50 crore after 10 days.
  • On its tenth day, the film earned 46.50 crore, marking a 69% increase from the previous day.
  • The second weekend collections total 74 crore.
  • Highest earnings for Day 10 are recorded at 46 crore, surpassing Stree 2's 33.80 crore on its second Saturday.
  • Pushpa 2 is the fastest Hindi film to achieve the 500 crore milestone.
  • It is the seventh Hindi film to join the 500 crore club.
"Allu Arjun‚Äôs biggie has scored 39% higher earnings than Stree 2 on the second Saturday."

Key statistics show that Pushpa 2 is approaching the 600 crore club, likely achieving this in just a couple of days. The film's impressive performance highlights its popularity and strong box office presence.

item.title: From Pavitra Punia - Eijaz Khan to Digvijay - Unnati; 2024's shocking splits - The Times of India
item.description:
From Pavitra Punia - Eijaz Khan to Digvijay - Unnati; 2024's shocking splits

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

In 2024, several notable television actors faced high-profile breakups, capturing the attention of fans and media alike. These separations highlight the challenges of maintaining relationships in the spotlight, where personal struggles often become public narratives.

  • Dalljiet Kaur and Nikhil Patel: Their relationship ended less than a year after their marriage in March 2023, shocking fans as both removed each other from their social media.
  • Pavitra Punia and Eijaz Khan: Despite a strong connection, they struggled with the pressures of fame, leading to their breakup in 2024.
  • Jashwant and Akriti: Announced their separation in 2024, highlighting challenges faced by couples under public scrutiny.
  • Akshay Kharodia and Divya: Also experienced a significant breakup in 2024, showcasing the difficulties of love in the entertainment industry.
  • Digvijay and Unnati: Their decision to end their relationship underscores the complexities of maintaining love amidst public scrutiny.
"Even relationships that seem perfect from the outside can face difficulties behind closed doors." - Insight from the article.

The article showcases the reality that love can be complicated even for celebrities, as these high-profile splits remind audiences of the personal challenges faced by those in the public eye.

item.title: Political slugfest over Allu Arjun continues as Congress defends Pushpa 2 star's arrest - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Political slugfest over Allu Arjun continues as Congress defends Pushpa 2 star's arrest

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The arrest of Telugu actor Allu Arjun has incited a major political debate in Telangana, with various parties reacting differently to the incident tied to a tragic stampede during the premiere of "Pushpa 2: The Rule".

  • Allu Arjun was arrested in connection with a woman's death due to a stampede at the Sandhya Theatre during the film's premiere.
  • Congress defended the arrest, emphasizing that it is lawful and that the party supports adherence to the legal process.
  • Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw criticized Congress, claiming they disrespect the creative industry and misplace blame for poor theater arrangements.
  • YS Jagan Mohan Reddy, Andhra Pradesh opposition leader, condemned the arrest, suggesting it was unfair to hold Arjun accountable for the stampede.
  • Arjun was initially sent to 14-day judicial custody but was later granted interim bail by the Telangana High Court.
"The cases filed against Arjun are within the purview of law and the court granted him bail." - B Mahesh Kumar Goud, Telangana Congress president

The incident has highlighted tensions between political factions in Telangana, with stark differences in how they view responsibility for the tragedy and their attitudes toward the film industry. As reactions continue to unfold, it remains crucial to balance accountability with fair treatment of individuals involved.

Allu Arjun is scheduled to meet his uncle Chiranjeevi today at the latter‚Äôs home following his recent arrest related to a tragic incident during a movie premiere.

Fans are eagerly awaiting updates from this meeting, particularly to hear Chiranjeevi's perspective on recent events. Stay tuned for more updates.

item.title: Vikrant Massey reveals PM Narendra Modi had tears in his eyes after watching The Sabarmati Report: 'Woh bhi bhavuk the' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Vikrant Massey reveals PM Narendra Modi had tears in his eyes after watching The Sabarmati Report: 'Woh bhi bhavuk the'

Date: Dec 15, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Vikrant Massey shared that Prime Minister Narendra Modi became emotional during the screening of his film, The Sabarmati Report, highlighting a heartfelt moment they shared.

  • PM Modi expressed that he loved the film and appreciated the efforts behind it.
  • Massey noted that both he and PM Modi were equally emotional during the screening.
  • Vikrant shared that the PM complimented his acting, which he cherishes.
  • The screening was dubbed by Massey as the "highest point" of his career, attended by several notable figures.
  • PM Modi praised the film for revealing the truth behind the 2002 Godhra train incident.
"Unko film pasand aya, humara prayas acha laga. Uss film ki screening ke time jitna main bhavuk tha, shayad woh bhi uss time utne hi bhavuk the."

The Sabarmati Report is centered on the tragic events surrounding a train fire in Gujarat in 2002 and aims to reveal historical truths.

item.title: AR Rahman gets appointed as Honorary President of Trinity Laban after announcing divorce with Saira Banu: 'When I met the...' - Firstpost
item.description:
AR Rahman gets appointed as Honorary President of Trinity Laban after announcing divorce with Saira Banu: 'When I met the...'

Publication Date: December 14, 2024

Source: Firstpost

Renowned composer A.R. Rahman has been appointed the Honorary President of Trinity Laban Conservatoire of Music and Dance, marking a significant moment in his career amidst personal changes.

  • Rahman takes on the honorary role for a five-year term.
  • He views this appointment as pivotal for nurturing musical talent in India.
  • Reflects on a past meeting with Andrew Lloyd Webber, highlighting his vision for musical theatre.
  • Emphasizes the need for government support and proper infrastructure for the arts in India.
  • Plans to undertake transformational projects in collaboration with institutions in India and abroad.
"If we invest in our talent and build the right infrastructure, we can open up a whole new genre of entertainment in India." - A.R. Rahman

Rahman's new role aims to foster global collaboration in music and dance while contributing to the evolution of performing arts in India, coinciding with upcoming major projects in the next year.

item.title: Saif Ali Khan says he asked PM Narendra Modi how much rest he got: 'It was about three hours; he signed a - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Saif Ali Khan says he asked PM Narendra Modi how much rest he got: 'It was about three hours; he signed a paper for Taimur, Jehangir'

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Times of India

The entire Kapoor clan visited PM Narendra Modi to invite him to commemorate Raj Kapoor's 100th anniversary celebrations. Saif Ali Khan shared his impressions from the meeting in a recent interview.

  • Saif Ali Khan expressed admiration for PM Modi's warmth and attentiveness during the meeting.
  • He revealed that Modi had very little rest, stating he gets only about three hours of sleep a night.
  • During the visit, Modi inquired about Saif's parents individually and signed a paper for Saif's children, Taimur and Jehangir.
  • Saif described the meeting as a special day and an honor for the Kapoor family.
"He asked about my parents individually and said he thought we would bring Taimur and Jehangir to meet him!"

This meeting not only highlighted the Kapoor family's respect for Raj Kapoor but also showcased the commitment of PM Modi to connect with cultural icons amidst his busy schedule.

item.title: Bigg Boss Telugu 8 Winner: Not Gautham, Nikhil Emerges Victorious In Nagarjuna's Show? - Oneindia
item.description:
Bigg Boss Telugu 8 Winner: Not Gautham, Nikhil Emerges Victorious In Nagarjuna's Show?

Publication Date: December 15, 2024

Source: OneIndia

The curtains for Bigg Boss Telugu 8 are about to drop, with rumors suggesting Nikhil has won the grand finale, despite Gautham being a strong contender.

  • The grand finale of Bigg Boss Telugu 8 is set for Sunday, featuring finalists Gautham, Nikhil, Nabeel, Prerana, and Avinash.
  • According to the Bigg Boss Telugu 8 Wikipedia page, Nikhil is expected to win, with Gautham finishing as runner-up.
  • Online voting results show Gautham leading with 318,791 votes (45%), while Nikhil trails with 212,617 votes (30%).
  • Nabeel secured third place with 101,932 votes (14%), followed by Prerana with 49,067 votes (7%), and Avinash with 25,113 votes (4%).
  • The anticipation for the winner has sparked mixed reactions among fans, especially considering Gautham's popularity.
"If Nikhil indeed takes the title, it will be an unexpected twist in the season's climax."

With the finale just hours away, fans are eager for the official announcement that will confirm the winner of Bigg Boss Telugu 8.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection day 10: Allu Arjun‚Äôs film sees massive jump, mints Rs 824.5 crore - The Indian Express
item.description:

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Pushpa 2 has been dominating the box office, achieving significant revenue in its first ten days. The film saw a remarkable increase in collections, largely influenced by recent events surrounding its lead actor.

  • The film recorded a 71% increase in collections on day 10, earning Rs 62.3 crore.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôre extremely sorry for the family, and I will personally be there to support them in whatever way. It‚Äôs purely accidental.‚Äù - Allu Arjun

Despite its success, the film's release was marred by a tragic incident that claimed a life, leading to Allu Arjun's temporary arrest.

item.title: Internet angry at Allu Arjun's 'celebration' after prison release as boy injured in Pushpa 2 stampede remains critical - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Internet angry at Allu Arjun's 'celebration' after prison release as boy injured in Pushpa 2 stampede remains critical

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 09:44 AM IST

Source: Hindustan Times

Allu Arjun's celebratory return home from prison following a high-profile arrest has sparked outrage online, particularly as a young victim from the associated stampede remains in critical condition.

  • Allu Arjun was arrested concerning a fan's death during the premiere of his film Pushpa 2: The Rule.
  • After his release, he was celebrated at home with significant industry support, which many deemed inappropriate given the ongoing tragedy.
  • Many social media users criticized the celebrations, calling it a PR stunt and questioning the lack of support for the deceased's family by Arjun.
  • The incident occurred during a large crowd gathering at Sandhya Theatre, leading to a stampede that resulted in significant casualties.
"Today's non-stop celebrity visits and the publicity around it has tilted the scales in favour of Revanth Reddy... It should have been a day of introspection, not celebration."

The critic response reflects a broader sentiment that celebrity culture can overshadow genuine human tragedy, urging a consideration of the consequences of such public displays amidst personal loss.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE| Saif Ali Khan on meeting PM Modi with Kapoor family: Asked how much rest he got, he said three hours a night - Hindustan Times
item.description:
EXCLUSIVE| Saif Ali Khan on meeting PM Modi with Kapoor family: Asked how much rest he got, he said three hours a night.

Date: Dec 15, 2024

Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Saif Ali Khan recently met Prime Minister Narendra Modi in Delhi along with the Kapoor family. The meeting was held in memory of the late Raj Kapoor, and Khan shared insights about the engaging encounter.

  • Saif Ali Khan attended the meeting with the Kapoor family in memory of Raj Kapoor.
  • He described PM Modi as attentive and charming despite a long day in Parliament.
  • The meeting was attended by Kareena Kapoor, Karisma Kapoor, Ranbir Kapoor, Alia Bhatt, and others.
  • PM Modi inquired about Saif's parents and signed a paper for Saif's children, Taimur and Jehangir.
  • Saif noted that PM Modi mentioned he gets about three hours of sleep a night.
‚ÄúI asked him how much rest he got and he said about three hours a night. It was a special day for me.‚Äù - Saif Ali Khan

This meeting not only commemorated Raj Kapoor's legacy but also highlighted the personal connection and respect between the Kapoor family and the Prime Minister. Saif expressed gratitude for the time spent with Modi, emphasizing the importance of family and legacy.

item.title: Allu Arjun was normal in jail, had rice and vegetable curry in dinner: Official - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Allu Arjun was normal in jail, had rice and vegetable curry in dinner: Official

Publication Date: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Allu Arjun, who was jailed following an incident at a film premiere, spent a normal night in prison and had rice and vegetable curry for dinner, according to an official from Telangana's prisons department.

  • Allu Arjun spent a night in Chanchalguda Central Prison after being arrested in the 'Pushpa 2' stampede case.
  • The actor was granted a four-week interim bail on the day of his arrest but was not released until the following morning.
  • During his time in jail, he did not request any special privileges and was treated as a special prisoner as per court order.
  • The delay in his release was due to procedural issues, as inmates are not typically released after 7 PM.
  • The incident at the movie premiere resulted in the death of a woman, leading to charges against Arjun and his security team.
‚ÄúHe was quite normal and did not appear depressed. Normally, the dinner time is 5:30 pm. However, late admissions are also served food. He had rice and vegetable curry.‚Äù

The situation highlights the challenges faced during high-profile releases and the implications of crowd management at events.

"Fans are thrilled by his transformation and eagerly await the magic Adhik is bringing to the screen."

The excitement surrounding Ajith's upcoming projects highlights his enduring popularity in the Telugu film industry. Fans are looking forward to Good Bad Ugly, which promises to deliver an engaging cinematic experience.

item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Vivian Dsena’s wife Nouran Aly poses tough questions to him, says ‘It boils my blood’

Published: December 15, 2024 7:01 AM IST | Source: BollywoodLife

The drama in Bigg Boss 18 intensifies as Vivian Dsena faces tough questions from his wife, Nouran Aly, challenging his gameplay and emotional state.

  • Weekend Ka Vaar episodes with Salman Khan bring significant changes and evaluations for contestants.
  • Nouran Aly enters the show, questioning Vivian's feelings and performance, revealing he promised to win the trophy.
  • She expresses frustration over his friendship with fellow contestant Karan Veer Mehra, who has stated he is not a friend.
  • The conversation appears to impact Vivian, leading to a potential reconsideration of his strategy in the game.

It's so emotional yrrr ?? And Nouran ma'am is giving all the feedback that Vivian needed ???

‚Äî ??????? (@devil_nahyan) December 14, 2024

With Salman Khan pointing out Vivian's lack of heroism on-screen, viewers are left curious about the potential changes in Vivian's behavior moving forward.

item.title: Horoscope Today, December 15, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs - India Today
item.description:
Horoscope Today, December 15, 2024: Check here Astrological prediction for all zodiac signs

Published On: Dec 15, 2024 | Source: Ayush Bisht

Daily horoscopes have been provided for all zodiac signs, offering insights into love, health, money, and career for December 15, 2024. Each sign's predictions highlight key themes and guidance for the day.

  • Aries: Take the lead in important tasks; focus on family connections.
  • Taurus: Embrace modern improvements; happiness will increase in the family.
  • Gemini: Expect rapid improvement; focus on creativity and learning.
  • Cancer: Complete essential tasks; maintain humility and control finances.
  • Leo: Enjoy professional success; expand your work opportunities.
  • Virgo: Strong support at work; promote auspicious activities.
  • Libra: Positive momentum; enhance spiritual growth and cooperation.
  • Scorpio: Focus on important tasks; be patient in personal matters.
  • Sagittarius: Increase in happiness at home; strengthen relationships.
  • Capricorn: Maintain momentum in efforts; seek support from colleagues.
  • Aquarius: Boost in positivity; focus on education and family connections.
  • Pisces: Emphasize harmony in relationships; strengthen family bonds.
‚ÄúYou will live peacefully and harmoniously with everyone.‚Äù

Overall, December 15, 2024, brings opportunities for growth and positive interactions across all zodiac signs, emphasizing the importance of relationships and personal efforts in achieving success.
